CREATE DATABASE datasciencegp052024;
GO

USE datasciencegp052024;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

--CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = '#MCGCPDOM202412GP05&'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-12-25T07:07:43Z&st=2024-12-22T23:07:43Z&spr=https&sig=InB5A0hMdHcqxgutLkSAh%2BKK%2BoR%2B2QU8p1aP%2BcQTK6c%3D'
GO

USE datasciencegp052024;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE UPExternalDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://stdatasciencetf01.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPCSVFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2)
)
